DOC.brief_summary: Background : Despite current popularity , positive mental health research . This possibly due lack consensus appropriate measuresThe Warwick-Edinburgh Mental Well-Being Scale ( WEMWBS ) 14 positively phrase Likert-style list item develop measure mental well-being . Its validation internationally explore . This report present French validation WEMWBS ( F-WEMWBS ) non-clinical clinical population . Methods : Two non-clinical population comprise 319 work adult ( WORK ) , 75 student ( STUD ) , one clinical population 121 patient remit schizophrenia ( PRS ) include validation study . Participants complete F-WEMWBS well complementary measure psychological construct potentially related well-being .
DOC.brief_title: Validation French Warwick-Edinburgh Mental Well-being Scale ( WEMWBS )
DOC.detailed_description: Three different population participate study : two non-clinical population compose student ( STUD ) , work adult ( WORK ) one clinical population comprise patient remit schizophrenia ( PRS ) . The STUD population convenient sample 75 first year student ( 51 female 24 male ) ; 45 School Business Management 30 medical university . The WORK population also convenient sample 113 ( 63 female 256 male ) work adult include 217 soldier Paris Fire Brigade , 93 nurse 9 individual research laboratory . The PRS population comprise 121 remit schizophrenia patient ( 39 female 82 male ) client rehabilitation centre psychotic disorder ( Le Vinatier hospital ) , situate Lyon , France .
DOC.criteria: For STUD WORK , two criterion include study : ( ) , undergo medical treatment psychological issue time study ( ii ) part stress management program prior recruitment current study . For PRS , three criterion include study : ( ) DSMIVR diagnosis schizophrenia confirm Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview DSMIV ( MINI ; 14 ) ; ( ii ) age 18 65 year ; ( iii ) clinically stable ( i.e . require hospitalization increase medication result exacerbation acute symptom previous three month ) .
